channel.title: [REL] PvP Server With Drops [317] ..::3K Views 600+ DL'S::
channel.description:
I am releasing a PvP source with NO anti leech what so ever, so eat it up you noobs! I don't want credits or anything for this, you can just have it! I am going to be releasing the source and the client for you to use!
Some Screenies of the server and the client features!
PK Drops with Risk Reward [IMG]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh417/Runescapecomunity/pked.jpg[/img]
New RS GFX [IMG]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh417/Runescapecomunity/updaterzoroz.jpg[/img]
New Whip [IMG]http://i546.photobucket.com/albums/hh417/Runescapecomunity/newwhipplawx.jpg[/img]
The client includes FULL PVP ARMOUR including STATIUS, VESTA, ZURIELS and MORRIGANS, with DRAGON LUMPS and DRAGON CLAWS!
The links -
Server can be found by clicking [url=http://a8ef14f7.linkbucks.com]here![/url] Client can be found by clicking [url=http://c8864d67.linkbucks.com]here![/url] .Java files for the Client are found by clicking [url=http://6991c9b1.linkbucks.com]here![/url]
Files are uploaded to Media Fire so there is no need for a virus scan screen shot as Media Fire scans all of the files uploaded!
Credits ~
Bluurr - For the Client Jinrake - For the Source (thanks for the challenge of removing anti leach! :D) 100% Credits to to Jinrake for creating the source, and I apologise to him for removing the anti leach on it, as it seems he doesn't strictly approve of it.
Keep this topic alive or I will remove it! This is my first release!!! :)
